page.title: 09Transport. Bus travel
page.content: In 1930 the Red and White began its service in the Chepstow area.Today in Chepstow they have 24 buses.In Cinderford they have 7 buses and in Ross they have 12.Altogether this totals 43 buses.The company also have 37 double deck buses.The company runs services all over the surrounding area People think bus fares are too high but the cost of keeping a fleet of buses on the road is very high.A single bus costs Â£50,000 to buy and this is in addition to repair bills and staff wages.Bus services operate between 06.30 and 23.00 on Weekdays and 12.00 and 23.30 on Sundays. Most of the buses are one man operated That is the driver collects fares as well as driving the bus.Drivers work two alternate shifts from 06.00 to 15.00 and from 15.00 to 12.00.
